devdoc.details: the ownership will be transferred after deployment to the router contract

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

processResponse(bytes32,bool).details: function to process the oracle response (only callable from oracle)

params.requestId: the id of the request to the Chainlink oracle
params.verified: wether the nft is locked or not on ethereum

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

verifyTokenInCollection(address,uint256,.details: call to verify if a token is locked in ethereum vault, this method can be called only from the collection manager contract

params.tokenId: the id of the nft in the synthetic collection

returns.requestId: the id of the request to the Chainlink oracle

whitelistCollection(address).details: whitelist collections in order to allow calling this contract (only router can whitelist after deploying the proxy, the router contract owns this one)

params.collectionId: the collection manager (sythetic collection from polygon)
